name: sandpit
description: A playground for creative coding using JavaScript and the canvas element

scripts.build-library: rm -rf lib/ && mkdir -p lib && babel src --presets babel-preset-es2015 --out-dir lib
scripts.build-dist:
rm -rf dist/ && mkdir -p dist && webpack && echo '
Object.assign(Sandpit.default, Sandpit)
Sandpit = Sandpit.default' >> dist/sandpit.js && uglifyjs dist/sandpit.js --compress --mangle --source-map dist/sandpit.min.js.map --output dist/sandpit.min.js
scripts.build-site: react-scripts build && cp -r dist build/dist && cp -r docs build/docs
scripts.build: npm run build-library && npm run build-dist && npm run build-docs && npm run build-site
scripts.deploy: npm run build && surge -p build -d sandpitjs.com

author: Charlie Gleason (http://charliegleason.com/)
